Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN INSERT INTO Production.Brands(BrandName) VALUES(@BrandName)
END;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN INSERT INTO Production.Categories(CategoryName) VALUES(@CategoryName) END;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN INSERT INTO Production.Products(ProductName, BrandID, CategoryID, ModelYear) VALUES(@ProductName, @BrandID, @CategoryID, @ModelYear) END;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
QueryScript
Property.Value:
SELECT BrandID, BrandName
FROM Production.Brands

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [Production].[Brands_View] AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value:
SELECT CategoryID, CategoryName
FROM Production.Categories

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [Production].[Categories_View] AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value:
SELECT ProductID, ProductName, ModelYear
FROM Production.Products

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [Production].[Products_View] AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value:
SELECT StoreID, ProductID, Quantity
FROM Production.Stocks

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [Production].[Stocks_View] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN INSERT INTO Sales.Orders(CustomerID, OrderStatus, OrderDate, RequiredDate, ShippedDate, StoreID, StaffID) VALUES(@CustomerID, @OrderStatus, @OrderDate, @RequiredDate, @ShippedDate, @StoreID, @StaffID) END;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN INSERT INTO Sales.Stores(StoreName, Phone, Email, Street, [State], ZipCode) VALUES(@StoreName, @Phone, @Email, @Street, @State, @ZipCode) END;

Property.Name: HeaderContents
QueryScript
Property.Value:
SELECT CustomerID, FirstName, LastName, PhoneNumber, Email
FROM [Sales].[Customers]

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [Sales].[Customer_View] AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value:
SELECT OrderID, ItemID, ProductID, Quantity
FROM Sales.Order_Items

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [Sales].[Order_Items_View] AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value:
SELECT OrderID, CustomerID, OrderStatus, OrderDate, RequiredDate, ShippedDate
FROM Sales.Orders

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [Sales].[Orders_View] AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value:
SELECT StaffID, FirstName, LastName, Active, StoreID
FROM [Sales].[Staff]

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [Sales].[Staff_View] AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value:
SELECT StoreID, StoreName, Phone, Email
FROM Sales.Stores

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [Sales].[Stores_View] AS
